item.title: Karwar, Belagavi, Raichur to get new cancer hospitals
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru, Nov 13: The Karnataka government has decided to set up three new cancer hospitals at Karwar, Belagavi and Raichur in partnership with Tata Memorial Hospital.
Minister for Medical Education Dr Sharanprakash Patil announced this on Wednesday after inaugurating new CT scan machine at Kidwai Institute of Oncology here.
Mr Patil said that cancer hospitals will also be set up at Kalaburagi and Mandya and a sum of Rs 45 crore had been set aside for the purpose.
